title: New Update
body: The update team say that in the next update will be give to players a chest when they pass the level. I'm level 20, but maybe I have to wait for the uptadte to go to level 30, beacuse if pass levels now I don't recive nothing, but if pass the levels after the update I'll recive a chest.

replies.body:
Hi dude, this is the italian board!
If you want to speak in english please use the english version, you can find it here!
https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en
